member.name: T:Winnovative.PdfPrint.ContextImpersonationLogonMode
member.summary: The logon mode for impersonation

member.name: F:Winnovative.PdfPrint.ContextImpersonationLogonMode.Automatic
member.summary: Automatic logon

member.name: F:Winnovative.PdfPrint.ContextImpersonationLogonMode.Explicit
member.summary: Explicit logon

member.name: T:Winnovative.PdfPrint.ContextImpersonationOptions
member.summary: This class encapsulates the options to control the context impersonation during tool execution

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.ContextImpersonationOptions.CurrentUserImpersonation
member.summary: A flag indicating if the tool should impersonate the current user during execution. By default this property is false.

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.ContextImpersonationOptions.Username
member.summary: The name of the user to logon before execution. The and properties must also be set. This property has priority over the property. By default this property is not set.

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.ContextImpersonationOptions.Domain
member.summary: The user Windows domain name. This property together with property define the user to logon before execution. If the user is not part of a Windows domain the machine name can be used. By default this property is not set.

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.ContextImpersonationOptions.Password
member.summary: The password of the user specified by and properties. By default this property is not set.

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.ContextImpersonationOptions.LogonMode
member.summary: The logon mode of the user before execution. This property has effect only when a username for impersonation is specified. The default logon mode is automatic.

member.name: T:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint
member.summary: This class encapsulates the necessary functionality to silently print PDF documents

member.name: M:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.#ctor
member.summary: The PdfPrint class constructor

member.name: M:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.GetPageCount(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the number of PDF pages of a PDF file
member.param: The full path of the PDF file
member.returns: The number of pages in PDF document

member.name: M:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.GetPageCount(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Gets the number of pages of a PDF document in a stream
member.param: The stream containing the PDF document
member.returns: The number of pages in PDF document

member.name: M:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.GetPageCount(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Gets the number of PDF pages of a PDF document
member.param: The memory buffer containing the PDF document
member.returns: The number of pages in PDF document

member.name: M:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.Print(System.String)
member.summary: Prints all the pages of a PDF file using the current printer and page settings
member.param: The full path of the PDF file to be printed

member.name: M:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.Print(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Prints all the pages of PDF document in a stream using the current printer and page settings
member.param: The stream containing the PDF document to be printed

member.name: M:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.Print(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Prints all the pages in a PDF document using the current printer and page settings
member.param: The memory buffer containing the PDF document to be printed

member.name: M:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.Print(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints the pages of a PDF file starting from a given PDF page number to the end using the current printer and page settings
member.param: The full path of the PDF file to be printed

member.name: M:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.Print(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints the pages of a PDF document in a stream starting from a given PDF page number to the end of the PDF document using the current printer and page settings
member.param: The stream containing the PDF document to be printed

member.name: M:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.Print(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints the pages of a PDF document starting from a given PDF page number to the end of the PDF document using the current printer and page settings
member.param: The memory buffer containing the PDF document to be printed

member.name: M:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.Print(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints a range of pages of a PDF file using the current printer and page settings
member.param: The full path of the PDF file to be printed

member.name: M:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.Print(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints a range of pages of a PDF document in a stream using the current printer and page settings
member.param: The stream containing the PDF document to be printed

member.name: M:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.Print(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints a range of pages of a PDF document using the current printer and page settings
member.param: The memory buffer containing the PDF document to be printed

member.name: E:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.PagePrintingEvent
member.summary: The event which is raised right before printing the PDF page. In the event handler you can end or cancel printing job

member.name: E:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.PagePrintedEvent
member.summary: The event which is raised right after the PDF page has been printed. In the event handler you can end or cancel printing job

member.name: E:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.PreparePagePrintingEvent
member.summary: The event which is raised immediately before each PagePrintingEvent event. In the event handler you can set the page settings for the page being printed, cancel or end printing job

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.DefaultPageSettings
member.summary: The page settings that are used as defaults for all pages to be printed

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.DocumentName
member.summary: The document name to display in a print status dialog box or printer queue while printing the document

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.PrinterSettings
member.summary: The settings of the printer that prints the document

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.RunTimeoutSec
member.summary: The maximum time allowed for this tool to run

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.UserPassword
member.summary: The user password to be used to open a password protected PDF document

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.OwnerPassword
member.summary: The owner password to be used to open a password protected PDF document

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.LicenseKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the license key string received from vendor. If this property is null the tool will automatically enter in evaluation mode

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.ImpersonationOptions
member.summary: The impersonation options used during tool execution

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.PdfToolFullPath
member.summary: Sets the full path of the .dat helper file. By default this file is expected to be found in the same folder with .dll assembly.

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.PdfDocumentInfo
member.summary: Gets the object encapsulating the PDF document properties. This objects is populated after tool execution finished

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.Color
member.summary: The PDF printing color. The default value is Color

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.Resolution
member.summary: The PDF printing resolution in DPI. The default value is 300

member.name: P:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrint.ShowStatusDialog
member.summary: Set this property to false to disable the status dialog during printing. The default value is true

member.name: T:Winnovative.PdfPrint.PdfPrintException
member.summary: This class represents an exception thrown by the PDF printer

member.summary: Constructs a PDF printer exception with the given error message

member.summary: Constructs a PDF printer exception with the given error message and the given inner exception object
member.param: The inner exception that triggered this exception
